name: Feyward Tree
description: The Feyward Tree is a huge construct with immense physical power and a magical nature. It has thick, resilient bark, and its branches are adorned with razor-leafed foliage, making it a formidable presence on the battlefield.
memorable: Its ability to absorb lightning damage and launch devastating area attacks makes it a unique and tactical threat.
goals: To protect its surroundings and eliminate intruders using its powerful attacks and control tactics.
relations: It may be associated with other constructs or guardians created by its master.
environment: Typically found in enchanted groves or areas rich in magic where it can serve as a protector.
strengths: Immunity to several damage types and conditions, multiattack capability, and magical resistance enhance its combat effectiveness.
weaknesses: Low mobility and vulnerability to cold damage can hinder its performance in battle.
attacks: Employs razor-leafed branch attacks that deal slashing and additional force damage, and it can unleash a flurry of razor-sharp leaves in an area.
most_powerful_ability: Flaying Leaves creates a dangerous area-of-effect attack that can severely damage multiple foes at once.
skills: Possesses good perception (modifier of +3), allowing it to detect hidden threats effectively.
additional_information: Gain hit points from lightning damage due to Lightning Absorption.
Multiattack capability allows striking twice in a turn.
Magic Resistance provides advantage against spells and magical effects.
Immune to shape-altering effects with Immutable Form.
Provokes opportunity attacks within 15 feet of it.

durable creature that absorbs lightning damage
huge construct that attacks with sharp branches
tree protector that uses area-of-effect attacks
creature immune to being charmed or frightened
